title: galaxy_convnet
description: Galaxies Morphology Classification Using CNNUsing the Galaxy-Zoo dataset available on kaggle: https://www.kaggle.com/c/galaxy-zoo-the-galaxy-challenge/data, we will exploit a Convolutional Neural Network to train a model for galaxy morphology classification.
